FieldDefinition.description: Select "true" if Material Performance Table contains value of blisters per hour (instead of boxes per hour)
FieldDefinition.name: nominalRateInBlisters

Row.code:
if (eventData.newValues.assignedTo !== eventData.oldValues.assignedTo && eventData.newValues.assignedTo) { me.SendActionAssignmentNotification({ to: Users[eventData.newValues.assignedTo].mailingAddress /* STRING */ , subject: "Action assigned to you ["+ eventData.newValues.productionLine +"]" /* STRING */ , messageBody: 'Problem Description:' + '
\r\n' + eventData.newValues.problemDescription + '
\r\n' + 'Solution Description:' + '
\r\n' + eventData.newValues.solutionDescription + '
\r\n' + 'Due Date:' + '
\r\n' + eventData.newValues.dueDate + '
\r\n' + 'Status:' + '
\r\n' + eventData.newValues.status/* STRING */ }); }
